script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Next up, we've got Andrea, a Google Data Engineer from London, originally from Italy! Now, Andrea tells us he's a huge fan of Queen, and rumor has it, he's even incorporated his love for data into one of their iconic songs. This one's dedicated to you, Sara!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Okay, 'Somebody to Love' - bold choice, man! But you know what? I dig the data twist.  Pretty clever.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Totally! You gotta respect someone who can make Queen relevant to, like, algorithms and stuff.  Plus, that voice is killer.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: The dedication to Sara was very sweet. And you can feel the passion, Andrea.  That's what matters most.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Aw, thank you, Andrea!  That was really special.  And I have to say, I'm kind of loving the data engineer anthem vibe.  Very on-brand.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: So, judges, did Andrea find the data to flow into your hearts?  It's time to decide!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Dude, I'm all about taking risks.  He owned it. It's a yes from me.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: He had guts, he had voice, he had data. What's not to love?  Hell yes!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: Andrea, your heart was in every word.  It was truly authentic.  It's a yes.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: A million yeses!  Andrea, you've inspired me to write a song about spreadsheets.  Get ready, Excel fans!

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses!  Looks like Andrea found the right data to flow straight into the next round.  And who knows, maybe we'll see a whole data-themed album soon!
